24. Scripting API Reference | Project.Model.Bank

Types:

  • model.Bank A collection of model.Events to build into a binary file, to be loaded by the FMOD Studio API.

Extension Methods:

  • Bank.getPath Retrieves the bank's unique path identifier.

model.Bank

A collection of model.Events to build into a binary file, to be loaded by the FMOD Studio API.

Bank.getPath

Retrieves the bank's unique path identifier.

Bank.getPath()

Returns the bank's path as a string.

See Also: Banks
